Imerominia

NPC ID7607

Imerominia is a staff member at the Library Historical Archive in the Arceuus. She is a horologist who can tell the player more about the Royal Accord of Twill, and the date convention Great Kourend uses.

She is also spoken to during Dragon Slayer II, where players ask her for information about Camorra.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Transcripts Imerominia speaks in:
  • Transcript of Dragon Slayer II

A spelling error in dialogue with Imerominia has been fixed. Fixing a misspelling when she introduces herself.

10 January 2019

Dialogue was changed.
